title: Questions about boosting and stolen account.
body:
So my friend's nephew gave his password away because the guy said he would boost his elo into gold. 

We scolded him about cheating, but now the guy has a free account and has been playing ranked none stop as his new account.

Is there any way I can get the account permanently suspended?

The biggest problem is we don't remember what email was used for the account, so we can't go through the proper channels. 

Does anyone have any experience with this?

No email, might be able to get IP and time account was created, but that's pretty much it. I'd understand if Riot couldn't do anything about it seeing as no email can be provided, and he pretty much lost his account because he's an idiot, but he's 12. We feel bad for him, and now he's not allowed to play league ever again.

I'd like to at least get his account removed so the jerk that stole it doesn't have a free ranked account. 

If someone from riot reads this, any info would be appreciated.

replies.body: I've seen similar posts that are nearly a year old with no responses, so i won't be surprised if no one reads this.

We can definitely help you out if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with as much info as you have on the account. I understand you simply want to have the account deleted or deactivated, so please specify that in your request.

Let me know if you have any questions.
